---
knit: (function(input, ...) {
    rmarkdown::render(
      input,
      output_dir = "Compiled_panels/",
      output_file = paste0("Compiled_panels/Developmental_Landscape_compiled_figures", '_', Sys.Date(), '.pdf'),
      envir = globalenv()
    )
  })
geometry: margin=0.25in
output:
  pdf_document: 
    latex_engine: xelatex
header-includes:
- \usepackage{caption}
- \captionsetup[figure]{labelformat=empty}
- \pagenumbering{gobble}
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE}
if(dir.exists("Compiled_panels/deprecated") == FALSE){
  dir.create("Compiled_panels/deprecated")
}

deprecated_compiled_figs = setdiff(list.files(path = "Compiled_panels/", recursive = FALSE), 
                                   list.dirs(path = "Compiled_panels", recursive = FALSE, full.names = FALSE))
file.rename(from = paste0("Compiled_panels/", deprecated_compiled_figs), paste0("Compiled_panels/deprecated/", deprecated_compiled_figs))

```
